title: Create a Simple Pod
description: Create a single Pod of image ||httpd:2.4.41-alpine|| in Namespace ||pluto||. The Pod should be named ||pod1|| and the container should be named ||pod1-container||.

steps: 2. Edit yaml to change container name to pod1-container

validations.command: kubectl get pod pod1 -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.status.phase}'
kubectl get pod pod1 -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[0].name}'
kubectl get pod pod1 -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[0].image}'
